title: Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA Tour”: How to Get Tickets
description: The rapper will celebrate the release of his new album by hitting over 60 arenas across the globe. Learn how to get tickets here. Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA Tour”: How to Get Tickets Jonah Krueger
author: Jonah Krueger
excerpt: Tyler, the Creator has detailed a 2025 world tour to support his new album CHROMAKOPIA. Learn how to get tickets here.
text: Tyler, the Creator has announced “CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR,” an expansive world tour that supports (you guessed it) his newest album, CHROMAKOPIA. Get Tyler the Creator Tickets Here The tour kicks off in February and is set to run throughout 2025. All told, the jaunt will see the enigmatic rapper hit over 60 cities across the globe. Secure your tickets to “CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR” here and learn more about the run below, including details on pre-sale codes, openers, and the full list of dates. What Is Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA” World Tour? “CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR” is an expansive run of live shows from Tyler, the Creator that will support his new album of the same name. It will see the rapper hit over 60 arenas across the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Europe, New Zealand, and Australia. If the upcoming jaunt is anything like previous album support tours from Tyler, the Creator, it’s sure to be theatrical and deeply thematic. The rapper boasted integrate staging and costume design during his IGOR era, and CHROMAKOPIA is shaping up to be every bit as conceptual. Will he be in his new sepia-toned costume? Will he wear the mask? Will he be backed by a cast of dancers? Hints might come once the album drops in full on Monday, October 28th, but only time will tell what the artist has in store for the CHROMAKOPIA stage show. Prior to the tour, Tyler, the Creator will be hosting his annual music festival Camp Flog Gnaw in Los Angeles this November. The event is set to feature performances from André 3000, Erykah Badu, DJ Mustard, Vince Staples, and Playboi Carti, as well as Tyler’s former Odd Future buddies, Earl Sweatshirt, Syd, Mike G, and Domo Genesis. Who Is Opening for Tyler, the Creator on the “CHROMAKOPIA” World Tour? Lil Yachty and Paris Texas will join Tyler, the Creator on the “CHROMAKOPIA” world tour. Lil Yachty is fresh off the release of Bad Cameo, his full-length collaborative album with James Blake, while Paris Texas dropped their excellent debut studio album Mid Air back in 2023. How Can I Get Tickets to Tyler, the Creator’s 2025 Tour? Tickets for Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA: The World Tour” are now on sale. Fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Are Tyler, the Creator’s Tour Dates? html:
Tyler, the Creator has announced “CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR,” an expansive world tour that supports (you guessed it) his newest album, CHROMAKOPIA.

Get Tyler the Creator Tickets Here

The tour kicks off in February and is set to run throughout 2025. All told, the jaunt will see the enigmatic rapper hit over 60 cities across the globe.

Secure your tickets to “CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR” here and learn more about the run below, including details on pre-sale codes, openers, and the full list of dates.

What Is Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA” World Tour?

“CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR” is an expansive run of live shows from Tyler, the Creator that will support his new album of the same name. It will see the rapper hit over 60 arenas across the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Europe, New Zealand, and Australia.

If the upcoming jaunt is anything like previous album support tours from Tyler, the Creator, it’s sure to be theatrical and deeply thematic. The rapper boasted integrate staging and costume design during his IGOR era, and CHROMAKOPIA is shaping up to be every bit as conceptual.

Will he be in his new sepia-toned costume? Will he wear the mask? Will he be backed by a cast of dancers? Hints might come once the album drops in full on Monday, October 28th, but only time will tell what the artist has in store for the CHROMAKOPIA stage show.

Prior to the tour, Tyler, the Creator will be hosting his annual music festival Camp Flog Gnaw in Los Angeles this November. The event is set to feature performances from André 3000, Erykah Badu, DJ Mustard, Vince Staples, and Playboi Carti, as well as Tyler’s former Odd Future buddies, Earl Sweatshirt, Syd, Mike G, and Domo Genesis.

Who Is Opening for Tyler, the Creator on the “CHROMAKOPIA” World Tour?

Lil Yachty and Paris Texas will join Tyler, the Creator on the “CHROMAKOPIA” world tour. Lil Yachty is fresh off the release of Bad Cameo, his full-length collaborative album with James Blake, while Paris Texas dropped their excellent debut studio album Mid Air back in 2023.

How Can I Get Tickets to Tyler, the Creator’s 2025 Tour?

Tickets for Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA: The World Tour” are now on sale. Fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Are Tyler, the Creator’s Tour Dates?

See the complete list of dates for Tyler, the Creator’s “CHROMAKOPIA: THE WORLD TOUR” below, and get tickets here.
